message.body: Ha! Had your number all along!
Hey, I'm riding up to Kensington to bring Zac some flowers. Any idea where he might be right now?
Oh no! But he's coming to my show tonight at highwire gallery at 8, you should come too!
Aw. No worries. Hope you find Zac!
Do you know the order for tomorrow, or around what time we'll go on?
I was hoping you'd kick it off.
Sure! We are gonna bring an amp in case we need it and might use the mic
Great! Frank will be there to run sound.
I'd like to move you to a different spot in the line-up and ask for a shorter bit, perhaps just the piece where you throw the meat into the audience.
Yea we were gonna cut it down to two and a half songs instead if that works

Heya! I'm so so sorry to bother you, I know yr super busy right now. But my leeway stuff is due tomorrow! I can totally fill out yr form for you and send it to you to vet if you don't have time to do it. Thank you so much! Hope the mediums are going magni
Thanks. Yes, forge away. Sorry i didn't have time to do it right now. See you soon.
Thank you!!!!! No problem at all! I'm still looking for a ride up there (my 1st one backed out), but I'm hoping to get up there Sunday!
